verses.name: Ezra 2:36
verses.text: The priests: the children of Jedaiah, of the house of Jeshua, nine hundred seventy and three.

verses.name: Ezra 2:37
verses.text: The children of Immer, a thousand fifty and two.

verses.name: Ezra 2:38
verses.text: The children of Pashur, a thousand two hundred forty and seven.

verses.name: Ezra 2:39
verses.text: The children of Harim, a thousand and seventeen.

verses.name: Ezra 2:40
verses.text: The Levites: the children of Jeshua and Kadmiel, of the children of Hodaviah, seventy and four.

verses.name: Ezra 2:41
verses.text: The singers: the children of Asaph, an hundred twenty and eight.
